extendedInfo.description: Baby ESP is a baby activity tracker that helps you easily log your baby's activities (Eating, Sleeping, Pooping and much more).Know at a glance the time since baby's last meal, nap or diaper change.* Used by thousands of parents!* Tracked over 3 million diapers and 3 million nursing sessions!* Full version has five star rating with over 2,500 ratings!This app is a free 7 day trial of Baby ESP to give you a chance to try everything out before buying the full version.  All features are enabled except for syncing between multiple devices.Basic Features:- Track both Naps and Night Sleep- Track Breast Feeding Sessions- Track Bottles- Track Diapers- Track Medicines- Track Breast Pumping- Track Baths- Track Growth against WHO growth charts- Track any number of children- Track any custom activity or medicine you want to add- Quick access from widgetAdvanced Features:- Get reminded when it's time for medicine or any other activity- Detailed statistics show you averages and totals of all activities- Charts show you how your baby is changing over time and can compare multiple babies- Daily journal for notes and pictures- "Night mode" dims your screen and tints it red to preserve night vision during night feedings- Share you data with anyone quickly and easily through email- Post charts to Facebook or Twitter- Store notes with any activity- Search within the app for any activity type, note or journal entry- Customizable main screen for access to the data most important to youCreated with tired, stressed parents in mind, Baby ESP makes logging baby's activities as simple as pressing a button. Time for others to care for baby? Just hand them Baby ESP! Easily transition to babysitters, grandparents, and other caregivers. The simple, intuitive interface lets others easily view baby's daily activities and enter new information. Now you will know what baby did while you were away, eliminating the questions "How long since he ate? How much did she eat? Did he take a nap?"Learn more at http://www.babyesp.com and http://support.babyesp.com

reviews.title: Great stats
reviews.comment: Love the way you can collect and compare data (eg: hours of sleep per day). Great app and well laid out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really good :)
reviews.comment: Totally in love with this app. It works perfectly. Can add new activities and reminder. The only problem is that now the trial period has exceeded. I would like to buy it,however the iterm isn\'t available in my country.
reviews.author: Lulu Chen

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This app is great but it lost a star because I bought the full version and my info wont transfer. The trial app wont let me look at the old info either :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I love this app. I love it so much I had to rate it I usally dont rate and commet on it. But Wat would really put it over the top would. When ur timeing something it showes up in the top bar where the notifications are. So you dont have to go back into the app to ckeck the time every time.
reviews.author: Lynnlee Barbati

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: Great app. Easy easy easy to use. U can run app and still use your phone! Highly recommend.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bought the full version within a day!
reviews.comment: This app is brilliant - from the timers, to the ability to track both baby and mum (I.e expressed breast milk by breast, time and volume) to the export function, everything is fantastic. When I bought the full version it prompted me to automatically import data from the trial so I didn\'t lose anything. Highly recommend!
reviews.author: Kathryn Winter

reviews.title: Lifesaver!
reviews.comment: Just the app I needed when I am too tired to remember anything.  The most useful and user friendly app I have ever had!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: I love this app alot! Its perfect. Its a perfect layout that no other app had. Yet... I really dont have 5 dollars to buy the whole app. I still give it 5 stars  because that\'s how much I recommend it if you do have that 5 bucks. :(
reviews.author: Cecilia Benzler

reviews.title: Great, will purchase full app when trial expires
reviews.comment: Very helpful in first few days w baby. Great for tracking her paterns
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: so far awesome!
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait to but it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good extras
reviews.comment: I like this app overall, but when it comes to specific stuff like breastfeeding recording, it\'s not as good as Feed Baby. This one I\'m unable to continue a feed after stopping, and the where it\'s finally recorded is confusing as you have to really LOOK to see which breast bub was last on. could do with a bodice L & R.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing First Impression
reviews.comment: I love that they offer a trial before you drop $5 on the full version so you can check out the features to see if this app is applicable for your family situation. My first impressions of this app are far better than I expected and I will likely purchase the full version. Still wondering how the \"sync\" feature works since that is the only feature disabled in this version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: This is an incredibly well-designed program! It has everything you need to keep track of your little one!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I LOVE this app! Best one I\'ve tried. Great widget, very user friendly, simply comprehensive, and easy to customize.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Just spent four hours looking for the best app. I chose this one \303\234 Only app with customizable widget that shows not just the time of last feeding etc, but how many hours and minutes ago that it happened. Well designed and easy to understand.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sugestion
reviews.comment: I have another app and I am trying this one out. It has more features so far but I can\'t continue a feed that I thought was finished and ended. And it would be nice to have a symbol in the notification bar saying I have a timer going
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Really good app, only thing that sucks is you gotta pay for it...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect for new moms
reviews.comment: This app saved my life when I first had my son. Being a new mom is overwhelming enough but trying to remember all the feeding, changing, sleeping and nursing times can be outrageous. Will be using this helpful app with my next child.
reviews.author: Remy Woods

reviews.title: Must try!
reviews.comment: This app makes it so easy to track and time everything! I never buy apps but didnt hesitate after using this trial app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok but...
reviews.comment: After 1 day graphs cause app to crash on Xperia mini pro
reviews.author: A Google User
